name: employee-directory-monorepo
description: Monorepo Root - NestJS Backend + React Frontend
author: Tech Lead

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q backend\dist frontend\dist node_modules backend\node_modules frontend\node_modules 2>nul || true
